item.title: What future for auto insurance premiums?
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
Following the judgment of the European Court of Justice of 1 March 2011, insurers are no longer allowed to take into account the sex of the insured to establish insurance premiums. A senator would like to know the practical consequences on automobile insurance. The European Court of Justice (ECJ), in its decision of 1 March 2011 […]

item.title: Car without a driver and insurance: 5 points that will change the market
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
In 20 years, fully or partially autonomous vehicles alone will account for nearly a third of global automotive production . However, according to the New York strategy consulting firm Oliver Wyman , this automation of mobility should have a real impact on auto insurance. Spotlight. A 200 billion market A recent study by Oliver Wyman reports that by 2035, between 20% and […]

item.title: AUTO INSURANCE, WHAT FUTURE?
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
While we see the flourishing of advertising offers for drivers penalized by “malus”, car insurance, saturated market, is it jostled with the arrival of new players? It seems that the sector is transforming more than it seems, especially with the change in the behavior of policyholders. 2.0 personal drivers who do not hesitate to compare […]
